A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: E9 can fix the disappointment by giving us a 'flashbak' scene of Luke taking on and defeating the knights of Ren before he goes into exile. After all\, the biggest let-down of e8 wass that we didn't get to really see Luke as a Jedi Master wielding his green lightsaber - this is what fans were waiting for. As an aside\, let's have Lando back in e9! More of C3-PO and R2 -- less of BB8. would love to know who snoke was\, just pick a character from 4\, 5\, or 6! such as...janus greejatus!
